languages.text: "Соломон сам себе хозяин, я не выбираю за него. Но если ты считаешь, что догматы арбитров так легко сломить каждому встречному, то ты оскорбляешь саму суть Адептус Арбитес".

"Solomorne is his own master — I do not choose for him. But if you think that an Arbitrator's tenets can be so easily broken by any passing stranger, then you insult the very core of the Adeptus Arbites."
languages.original_text: "Соломон сам себе хозяин, я не выбираю за него. Но если ты считаешь, что догматы арбитров так легко сломить каждому встречному, то ты оскорбляешь саму суть Адептус Арбитес".

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne is his own master — I do not choose for him. But if you think that an Arbitrator's tenets can be so easily broken by any passing stranger, then you insult the very core of the Adeptus Arbites."

"Solomorne is his own master — I do not choose for him. But if you think that an Arbitrator's tenets can be so easily broken by any passing stranger, then you insult the very core of the Adeptus Arbites."

"Solomorne is his own master — I do not choose for him. But if you think that an Arbitrator's tenets can be so easily broken by any passing stranger, then you insult the very core of the Adeptus Arbites."

"Solomorne is his own master — I do not choose for him. But if you think that an Arbitrator's tenets can be so easily broken by any passing stranger, then you insult the very core of the Adeptus Arbites."

languages.text: "Solomorne ist sein eigener Herr ... ich wähle nicht für ihn. Aber falls Ihr denkt, dass sich ein Arbitrator von {mf|einem|einer} Fremden so leicht von seinen Grundsätzen abbringen lässt, beleidigt Ihr das Adeptus Arbites in seinem Kern."
languages.original_text: "Solomorne is his own master — I do not choose for him. But if you think that an Arbitrator's tenets can be so easily broken by any passing stranger, then you insult the very core of the Adeptus Arbites."

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne ist sein eigener Herr ... ich wähle nicht für ihn. Aber falls Ihr denkt, dass sich ein Arbitrator von {mf|einem|einer} Fremden so leicht von seinen Grundsätzen abbringen lässt, beleidigt Ihr das Adeptus Arbites in seinem Kern."

languages.text: « Solomorne est son propre maître, je ne déciderai pas en son nom. Mais c'est faire insulte à l'essence même de l'Adeptus Arbites qu'imaginer le premier étranger venu capable faire vaciller les préceptes d'un arbitrator. »
languages.original_text: "Solomorne is his own master — I do not choose for him. But if you think that an Arbitrator's tenets can be so easily broken by any passing stranger, then you insult the very core of the Adeptus Arbites."

traits.locale_text: « Solomorne est son propre maître, je ne déciderai pas en son nom. Mais c'est faire insulte à l'essence même de l'Adeptus Arbites qu'imaginer le premier étranger venu capable faire vaciller les préceptes d'un arbitrator. »

languages.text: “索罗蒙的所有决定都是他自己做出来的，我无法干涉他的选择。况且，如果你觉得随便什么人都能轻易干涉法务官的原则，那你恐怕是在侮辱帝国法务部。”
languages.original_text: "Solomorne is his own master — I do not choose for him. But if you think that an Arbitrator's tenets can be so easily broken by any passing stranger, then you insult the very core of the Adeptus Arbites."

traits.locale_text: “索罗蒙的所有决定都是他自己做出来的，我无法干涉他的选择。况且，如果你觉得随便什么人都能轻易干涉法务官的原则，那你恐怕是在侮辱帝国法务部。”

languages.text: «Solomorne no es un lacayo; toma sus propias decisiones. Si creen que los votos de un Arbitrator son tan frágiles como para que los quebranten por un{mf||a} desconocid{mf|o|a}, están insultando al corazón del Adeptus Arbites».
languages.original_text: "Solomorne is his own master — I do not choose for him. But if you think that an Arbitrator's tenets can be so easily broken by any passing stranger, then you insult the very core of the Adeptus Arbites."

traits.locale_text: «Solomorne no es un lacayo; toma sus propias decisiones. Si creen que los votos de un Arbitrator son tan frágiles como para que los quebranten por un{mf||a} desconocid{mf|o|a}, están insultando al corazón del Adeptus Arbites».

languages.text: 「ソロモーンは自分自身の主だ。{mf|俺|私}が彼の代わりに選ぶことはしない。しかし、もし君が、アービトレイターの信条が通りすがりの他人に簡単に破られると思うなら、それは高等裁定局の核心そのものを侮辱していることになる」
languages.original_text: "Solomorne is his own master — I do not choose for him. But if you think that an Arbitrator's tenets can be so easily broken by any passing stranger, then you insult the very core of the Adeptus Arbites."

traits.locale_text: 「ソロモーンは自分自身の主だ。{mf|俺|私}が彼の代わりに選ぶことはしない。しかし、もし君が、アービトレイターの信条が通りすがりの他人に簡単に破られると思うなら、それは高等裁定局の核心そのものを侮辱していることになる」

languages.text: "Solomorne kimsenin hizmetkârı değil, işine karışacak hâlim yok. Ancak siz, bir Yargıcının ilkelerinin herhangi biri tarafından kolayca sarsılabileceğini ima ederek Adeptus Arbites'in özüne hakaret ediyorsunuz."
languages.original_text: "Solomorne is his own master — I do not choose for him. But if you think that an Arbitrator's tenets can be so easily broken by any passing stranger, then you insult the very core of the Adeptus Arbites."

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne kimsenin hizmetkârı değil, işine karışacak hâlim yok. Ancak siz, bir Yargıcının ilkelerinin herhangi biri tarafından kolayca sarsılabileceğini ima ederek Adeptus Arbites'in özüne hakaret ediyorsunuz."
